Description: Two fragments of a bifacial knife: of dark brown flint, one being the rounded tip of the blade and the other part of the middle section. Pressure flaked, with careful sharpening of the edge. One face is flat and the other slightly convex.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Djer, Bears excavator's mark, O.
Curator's comments: See also W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' I (London, 1902), pl.XIV, group O.
Bibliographic references: Davies 1987 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities in the British Museum
